content.enUS: Typescript, Express, Mongo (with Mongoose), Apollo (GraphQL), React, Material-UI, Formik2
Based on students' background & knowledge, we could start with some small modules

I don't personally have the bandwidth to handle daily operation. We are seeking non-profit organization to manage the daily operation. Please observe the following criteria.

  • I will support technical & financial support of software & service hosting
  • You are only allowed to charge no more than 1% of service solely use for dispute cost and free coupon give-a-way.
  • You are not allowed to promote any religious or politically beliefs. (it is okay if your organization has religious background.
  • I am authorized to monitor & review the transaction records without further permission.

If you are interested and accept the condition, please feel free to contact me. Additional information of your organization might be to be provided if not reputable.
